    • Method Detail

      • createCertificateIssuerConfig

        @POST(value="v3/certificate-issuer-configurations")
retrofit2.Call<CertificateIssuerConfigResponse> createCertificateIssuerConfig(@Body
                                                                                                                                   CreateCertificateIssuerConfig createCertificateIssuerConfig)
        Create certificate issuer configuration. Configure the certificate issuer to be used when creating the device custom certificates. <br> **Example usage:** ``` curl -X POST \\ -H 'authorization: <valid access token>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json;charset=UTF-8' \\ https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/certificate-issuer-configurations \\ -d '{ \"reference\": \"customer.dlms\", \"certificate_issuer_id\": \"01621a36719d507b9d48a91b00000000\" }' ```
        Parameters:
        createCertificateIssuerConfig - Certificate issuer configuration request (required)
        Returns:
        Call<CertificateIssuerConfigResponse>

      • deleteCertificateIssuerConfigByID

        @DELETE(value="v3/certificate-issuer-configurations/{certificate-issuer-configuration-id}")
retrofit2.Call<java.lang.Void> deleteCertificateIssuerConfigByID(@Path(value="certificate-issuer-configuration-id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String certificateIssuerConfigurationId)
        Delete certificate issuer configuration. Delete the configured certificate issuer configuration. You can only delete the configurations of custom certificates.
        Parameters:
        certificateIssuerConfigurationId - The ID of the certificate issuer configuration. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<Void>

      • getCertificateIssuerConfig

        @GET(value="v3/certificate-issuer-configurations/lwm2m")
retrofit2.Call<CertificateIssuerConfigResponse> getCertificateIssuerConfig()
        Get certificate issuer configuration. Provides the configured certificate issuer to be used when creating device certificates for LwM2M communication.<br>
        Returns:
        Call<CertificateIssuerConfigResponse>

        @GET(value="v3/certificate-issuer-configurations/{certificate-issuer-configuration-id}")
retrofit2.Call<CertificateIssuerConfigResponse> getCertificateIssuerConfigByID(@Path(value="certificate-issuer-configuration-id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String certificateIssuerConfigurationId)
        Get certificate issuer configuration. Provides the configured certificate issuer.
        Parameters:
        certificateIssuerConfigurationId - The ID of the certificate issuer configuration. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<CertificateIssuerConfigResponse>

      • getCertificateIssuerConfigs

        @GET(value="v3/certificate-issuer-configurations")
retrofit2.Call<CertificateIssuerConfigListResponse> getCertificateIssuerConfigs(@Query(value="limit")
                                                                                                                                    java.lang.Integer limit,
                                                                                                                                    @Query(value="order")
                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String order,
                                                                                                                                    @Query(value="after")
                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String after,
                                                                                                                                    @Query(value="include")
                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String include,
                                                                                                                                    @Query(value="reference__eq")
                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String referenceEq)
        Get certificate issuer configurations. Get certificate issuer configurations, optionally filtered by reference. <br> **Example usage:** ``` curl \\ -H 'authorization: <valid access token>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json;charset=UTF-8' \\ https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/certificate-issuer-configurations \\ ``` ``` curl \\ -H 'authorization: <valid access token>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json;charset=UTF-8' \\ https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/certificate-issuer-configurations?reference__eq=dlms \\ ``` Note: This endpoint does not implement pagination and therefore, list control parameters such as `limit` or `after` will be ignored by the system.
        Parameters:
        limit - How many objects to retrieve in the page. The minimum limit is 2 and the maximum is 1000. Limit values outside of this range are set to the closest limit. (optional)
        order - The order of the records based on creation time, `ASC` or `DESC`; by default `ASC`. (optional)
        after - The ID of The item after which to retrieve the next page. (optional)
        include - Comma-separated list of data fields to return. Currently supported: `total_count` (optional)
        referenceEq - The certificate name to which the certificate issuer configuration applies. (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<CertificateIssuerConfigListResponse>

      • updateCertificateIssuerConfig

        @PUT(value="v3/certificate-issuer-configurations/lwm2m")
retrofit2.Call<CertificateIssuerConfigResponse> updateCertificateIssuerConfig(@Body
                                                                                                                                        CertificateIssuerConfigRequest certificateIssuerConfigRequest)
        Update certificate issuer configuration. Configure the certificate issuer to be used when creating device certificates for LwM2M communication. <br> **Example usage:** ``` curl -X PUT \\ -H 'authorization: <valid access token>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json;charset=UTF-8' \\ https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/certificate-issuer-configurations/lwm2m \\ -d '{ \"certificate_issuer_id\": \"01621a36719d507b9d48a91b00000000\" }' ```
        Parameters:
        certificateIssuerConfigRequest - Certificate Issuer Configuration Request (required)
        Returns:
        Call<CertificateIssuerConfigResponse>

      • updateCertificateIssuerConfigByID

        Parameters:
